column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Cope in the World of Ego
#Text=Ego is Latin for ' Self ' .
#Text=Everyone has an ego , it is how they want to project themselves to others , how people expect others to treat them , ego is our expectation of our own self .
#Text=It is n't even a bit simple as it sounds and it tends to get extremely annoying when people impose their ego on us .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Be humble .
#Text=Thy should be humble first in order to cope up with the ego of others .
#Text=You should be aware of your ego and should restrict its imposition on others - unnecessarily .
#Text=Acknowledge .
#Text=People impose their ego or are " egoistic " due to want of acknowledgement and/or acceptance from others .
#Text=They may not seem like your average attention seekers but they do crave for it - unconsciously .
#Text=Remember .
#Text=Remember the points of imposition of ego and try not to impose yours in those ' dangerous ' waters .
#Text=Understand .
#Text=Understand that ego is the image that a person associates with himself and it is natural to be present .
#Text=It by understanding that everyone is different and unique in their own way that we can cope in the world of ego .
#Text=Lose to win .
#Text=When its the war of egos , the first one to lose is actually the winner .
#Text=If a heated argument is one , lose it .
#Text=As the argument ends - you win .
#Text=Though know when you can afford to lose and when it is required to win .
#Text=Be ahead of the curve .
#Text=Always be ahead of the matters in order to escape the trap of ego conflict .
#Text=Once the opposition knows you are no longer in their league , you will never be bothered .
#Text=Learn .
#Text=Learning how others exert their ego on us , how we exert/impose our ego on others , what is the cause for it , why we do it are some questions worth contemplating over .
#Text=When we tend to find answers to these questions , coping with ego will seem a lot more easier .
#Text=Trade fairly .
#Text=All egoistic people tend to expect something in return from us , either in form of appreciation or favour or applause or flatter or respect or acknowledgement .
#Text=Knowing this demand and catering to it in our bounds & comfort zone is the right way to tackle and cope with the world of ego .
#Text=Become a pacifist .
#Text=Being a pacifist , not being too aggressive or offensive in your opinions or views or speech can be quite helpful in coping with ego .
#Text=People tend to use their ego as a defense mechanism to protect themselves or their beliefs from what they find to be threatening or offensive .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Smile gently and behave in a friendly way .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Being humble never akin to low self image or morale or allowing others to exploit oneself .
#Text=It just means not to assert thy ego on others - unnecessarily .
#Text=Always look out for your imposition of the ego on others .
